publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-219 Rosie Kane: Citizen Y Youth Project—That the Parliament congratulates the young people involved in the Edinburgh youth project, Citizen Y, on their mural at St John’s Church called "Who are you calling a ned?"; welcomes such positive images of young people in the current climate of scapegoating and stigma and acknowledges that building productive relationships with young people depends upon giving them the respect and opportunities that they appear to lack from their elected representatives at the moment.
S2M-219 Citizen Y Youth Project (lodged on 3 July 2003) Frances Curran*
S2M-219 Citizen Y Youth Project (lodged on 3 July 2003) Chris Ballance*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-219 Citizen Y Youth Project (lodged on 3 July 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
